title: "Contact"
---

*[Accredited Swiss Higher Education Institutions](https://www.swissuniversities.ch/en/topics/studying/accredited-swiss-higher-education-institutions-1)* are strongly encouraged to join the project and to actively contribute.

Further *Swiss Higher Education Institutions* and *research institutes* are welcome to join the project and to actively contribute.

Snyergies with *additional stakeholders* at the national and international level are also welcome.

If you would like to join the project, to provide feedback or to ask questions, please [contact us](mailto:naif@library.ethz.ch).
